extendedInfo.description: Let your kids have fun while improving their coordination skills with Cuby.Meet Baby Cuby, the star of the Pretty Pet series.Years before he started his pet salon with his friends, Cuby was just as loveable and cute as any other adorable pets.Your kids would love to discover and interact with Cuby as they play  together. As a pet owner your kids would also be responsible for keeping their pet happy! This pet loves lollipops and to play games with your kids through a simple touch! Does your kids like playing Peekaboo and Bubbles? So does Cuby!  Keeping this pet happy can get you rewarded with clothes and backgrounds for free! Your kids can create their own stories by mixing and matching clothes and backgrounds, enhancing their creativity.The 3D environment this game is built upon providing your kids a new exciting environment that interacts with them from different angles. Packed with unexpected actions and animations at every corner that will keep your children entertained for hours, perfect for road trips.Playing with Cuby's Bubble game can also help build up your children's eye and hand coordination skills at a level that's designed perfectly for themEducating while playing makes this game a must have for parents!Tips on How to Keep Cuby Happy:- Feed him his favorite snacks or beverages (ice cream, apple juice, lollipop, milk, cookies).- Play Peekaboo with him (wait 15 seconds and he will hide behind a tree or boxes).- Play Passing the Ball with him (tap on the ball that is found on the left side of the screen).- Play Bubble Game with Cuby to earn free treats!- Cuby likes to get a good rub on his head.- Visit him regularly to receive a daily bonus.About Cuby's Happy Meter :- At 80%, you will be able to press the button with a paper airplane to see some hilarious actions!- At 90%, you will be able to press the button with a music note to see Cuby sings and plays guitar!- At 100%, you will receive either new clothes, new environment, or free snacks!

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I don\'t get why people are complaining Cuby is adorable and cute anime like c: Also the bubble game is pretty simple on easy and normal mode. For those of you who tap the bubble wait until the bubble has a green circle around it then tap it if you did that, recalibrate the touch screen good luck ciao~
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I HATE IT , PERIOD.
reviews.comment: I hate it because  . You need to pay for lollypops and ice cream. . Sisors in cuby\'s head, it looks dangerous . Once i tried to feed cuby a lollypop, then cuby throws the lollypop oway and demands icecream . It is D.U.M.B. . Dose\'nt give points for any app after download . Rip-off              Don\'t download EVER!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Impossible to get 3 stars in normal mode!
reviews.comment: For some reason I always miss 1 out of 3 bubbles and end up with 2 stars! I pushed them all at the same time it keeps saying I missed it when I didn\'t! Grrr
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ugh DO NOT DOWNLOAD
reviews.comment: Wow............... Don\'t download. Deserves 0 stars. Cube does not even do what u tell him to.  He just demands something else. Example: i do something nice like feed him a cookie, he throws it away and demands ice cream.Really? REAL MONEY FOR FOOD. SERIOUSLY  Want a good pet app? Try Eelooz, furdiburb, or Drago pet.

reviews.title: Cute, But Getting Boring
reviews.comment: When I first got this app, it was fun. But soon, it got pretty boring. You really can\'t do much with Cuby anymore and the bubble game is getting boring, too. It needs more fun things to do.

reviews.title: Cute
reviews.comment: Definitely cute. Dont like the weird scissors-hair. Its a bit boring. It\'d be more interesting and funner if it were like a tamagotchi where it can grow up to be different depending on how well you took care of it.
